goal.en: This course provides a solid overview of basic topics in Design of Experiments (DoE), a powerful data collection methodology widely applied in many scientific areas such as industry, medicine, agriculture, and marketing research.
goal.ch: This course provides a solid overview of basic topics in Design of Experiments (DoE), a powerful data collection methodology widely applied in many scientific areas such as industry, medicine, agriculture, and marketing research.

content.en:
1. Introduction to DoE
2. Analysis of Variance
3. Experiment with a Single Factor
4. Factorial Experiments
5. Fractional Factorial Designs
6. Regression Modelling
7. Response Surface Methodology
8. Optimal Designs for GLM (if time permits)
9. Active Learning (if time permits)
content.ch:
1. Introduction to DoE
2. Analysis of Variance
3. Experiment with a Single Factor
4. Factorial Experiments
5. Fractional Factorial Designs
6. Regression Modelling
7. Response Surface Methodology
8. Optimal Designs for GLM (if time permits)
9. Active Learning (if time permits)

textbook.en: 1. Montgomery, DC. (2013). Design and Analysis of Experiments, 8ed. John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., Hoboken, NJ. 2. Ackinson, AC, Donev, AN, and Tobias, RD. (2007). Optimum Experimental Designs, with SAS. Oxford University Press, Oxford, UK.
textbook.ch: 1. Montgomery, DC. (2013). Design and Analysis of Experiments, 8ed. John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., Hoboken, NJ. 2. Ackinson, AC, Donev, AN, and Tobias, RD. (2007). Optimum Experimental Designs, with SAS. Oxford University Press, Oxford, UK.

domain.en: 生物統計 、 工業統計
domain.ch: 生物統計 、 工業統計

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
ch: 學制:限學士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
